title: Saffron Geist 1/27: Stonks, Halsey, Holocaust, Miami LeBron
itunes:title: Saffron Geist 1/27: Stonks, Halsey, Holocaust, Miami LeBron
description:
On this edition of Saffron Geist Jack and Miles discuss the wild stock market moves in regards to AMC and BlackBerry, Halsey is pregnant, today is Holocaust Remembrance Day, and the internet is discussing their favorite LeBron era.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
